import warnings

# Or
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore', category=UserWarning)

import streamlit as st

import plotly.express as px

# Page configuration
st.set_page_config(layout="wide")

# Load your pre-trained model
with open('linear_model.pkl', 'rb') as f:
    lm2 = pickle.load(f)
